title: Define player profile JSON schema & generator scaffold
description: Create `scripts/generators/generate_player_profiles.py` scaffold. Define the JSON schema for player profiles per the PRD Section 6.1 — header, career_stats, phase_performance, tags, vs_bowling_type (batters), vs_batting_hand (bowlers), vs_teams, entry_point. Output to `outputs/player_profiles/player_profiles_2023.json`. Validate schema against PRD Appendix A examples.

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
